property.name: unit
property.description: The unit the page is measured in. For example "px" or "in".

property.name: dpu
property.description: The dots-per-unit of the page. This is used to derive the "ink unit" size of the page. For instance a page that is "300px" and has a "dpu" of 2 would result in a page 600 ink units wide.

property.name: background
property.description: The background of the ink page. See *[link:A5.InkBackground Settings Object]*.

property.name: lines
property.description: Optional lines to put on the ink page. See *[link:A5.InkLines Ruled Settings Object]* or *[link:A5.InkLines Graph Settings Object]*.
